title.value: No Wrong Turns: The Simple Geometry Of Neural Networks Optimization Paths
title.justification: The research paper mentions this title explicitly at the beginning and in the header on each page.
title.quote: No Wrong Turns: The Simple Geometry Of Neural Networks Optimization Paths

extractions.description: The paper investigates the optimization dynamics of neural networks, focusing on geometric properties along optimization paths. It provides empirical analysis across various tasks and network architectures, suggesting that optimization paths exhibit stable dynamics, which theoretically guarantees linear convergence and effective learning rate schedules.

type.justification: The paper provides empirical analysis and experimental results to understand the optimization dynamics of neural networks.
type.quote: We conduct our experiments on image classification, semantic segmentation and language modeling across different batch sizes, network architectures, datasets, optimizers, and initialization seeds. We discuss the impact of each factor.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on understanding the optimization dynamics and pathways of neural networks.
name.quote: Understanding the optimization dynamics of neural networks is necessary for closing the gap between theory and practice.

name.justification: The paper delves into the training dynamics and pathways of neural networks during optimization.
name.quote: Stochastic first-order optimization algorithms are known to efficiently locate favorable minima in deep neural networks.

name.justification: The paper analyzes and discusses the loss landscapes of neural networks and their impact on optimization.
name.quote: Our analysis reveals that these quantities exhibit predictable, consistent behavior throughout training, despite the stochasticity induced by sampling minibatches.
